code: import axios from"axios";export default class PizzaService{static async getAll(currentPage){const response=await axios.get("https://6560dbff83aba11d99d1a040.mockapi.io/pizza/items?limit=4&page="+currentPage);console.log(typeof response.data);return response;}static async getItem(id){const response=await axios.get("https://6560dbff83aba11d99d1a040.mockapi.io/pizza/items/"+id);return response;}}
